content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: acacia_boat
inventory=[{"type": "cod_spawn_egg", "quantity": 61, "index": 10}, {"type": "infested_chiseled_stone_bricks", "quantity": 18, "index": 18}, {"type": "quartz_slab", "quantity": 35, "index": 21}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 17, "index": 26}, {"type": "lapis_lazuli", "quantity": 37, "index": 27}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 23, "index": 29}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral", "quantity": 13, "index": 35}, {"type": "jungle_fence", "quantity": 47, "index": 37}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 38}]
thought: To craft an acacia_boat, I need to first move the acacia_planks from slot 38 to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
